{{South Park character
|name = 6th Graders Bruisers
|image = 6thgraderbruisers.png
|gender = Male
|job = Student
|appearance = ''[[South Park: The Fractured But Whole]]''
}}{{Stub}}

The '''6th Graders Bruisers''' are a group of [[The 6th Graders|6th Graders]] who first appeared in the game '' [[South Park: The Fractured But Whole]] '' as recurring enemies. They appear in some episodes of the show.

==Appearance==
They are short sixth graders with a very small variety of body shapes. They all wear jackets with collars and fingerless gloves with different color schemes.

==''[[South Park: The Fractured But Whole]]''==
One of them is seen with a group of 6th graders near the bus stop, fighting with another 6th grader to see who throws a stone at the squirrel that was on top of the tree, the [[The New Kid|New Kid]] has the option to make the fireworks explode near him so that he becomes weaker during the battle.

==Prominence==
*"[[Fort Collins]]" - One of them is seen in a photo on [[Heidi Turner]]'s emoji analysis.
*"[[A Boy And A Priest]]" - Seen skating at [[Kidzone Roller Rink]].
